faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our products and services.

range.q: How far can I drive on a full battery?
range.a: The range of our e-bikes is between 60 and 120 kilometres, depending on the model, riding style, terrain and weather conditions.

charging.q: How long does it take to charge the battery?
charging.a: On average, it takes 4 to 6 hours to fully charge a battery. Our batteries can also be partially charged without damage.

warranty.q: Do the e-bikes come with a warranty?
warranty.a: Yes! We offer a standard 2-year warranty on both the bicycle and the electrical components, such as the battery and motor.

test_drive.q: Can I test the e-bike first?
test_drive.a: Certainly! Please contact us to schedule a test drive at a location near you.

maintenance.q: What if I need to replace parts or require maintenance?
maintenance.a: Our e-bikes are modular in design. Simply contact us and we will quickly assist you with parts or servicing.

delivery.q: How will my e-bike be delivered?
delivery.a: Your e-bike will be delivered to your home ready to ride and fully adjusted. No assembly required!

faq.cant_find_answer: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our team is here to help you get back on track.

legal.title: Legal
legal.description: Our privacy policy and terms of service apply to all of our services.

cookies.analytical: Anonymous statistics to improve the website experience.

gdpr.access_desc: You can view and update your data via your account settings.
gdpr.delete_desc: You can request to have all your personal data deleted.

sections.title: Privacy Policy
sections.desc:
Your privacy is important to us. It is our policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, { company }, and other sites we own and operate.

We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.

We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.

We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.

sections.title: GDPR Compliance
sections.desc:
If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights. If you wish to be informed what Personal Information we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please contact us.

In certain circumstances, you have the following data protection rights:
• The right to access, update or to delete the information we have on you.
• The right of rectification.
• The right to object.
• The right of restriction.
• The right to data portability.
• The right to withdraw consent.

sections.title: Terms of Service
Disclaimer
sections.desc:
The materials on { company }'s website are provided on an 'as is' basis. { company } makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

Further, { company } does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.

sections.title: Limitations
sections.desc: In no event shall { company } or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on { company }'s website, even if { company } or a { company } authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.desc: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of The Netherlands and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that State or location.

sections.title: Cookie Policy
sections.desc:
We use cookies to help us improve, promote, and protect our services. By continuing to use the site, you agree to our use of cookies.

What are cookies?
Cookies are simple text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device by a website’s server. Each cookie is unique to your web browser. It will contain some anonymous information such as a unique identifier, website’s domain name, and some digits and numbers.

What types of cookies do we use?
• Necessary cookies: allow us to offer you the best possible experience when accessing and navigating through our website and using its features.
• Analytical cookies: enable us to collect aggregated data for statistical purposes on how our visitors use the website.

about.title: About {name}
about.subtitle: We are a team of adventurers, creatives, and outdoor enthusiasts with a shared mission: to bring people closer to adventure.
about.tagline: More than just e-bikes – we create experiences.

passion.title: Our Passion
passion.desc_1: At {name}, we don't just build electric offroad bikes; we craft experiences. We are a small but tight-knit team with a huge passion for adventure, nature, and storytelling.
passion.desc_2: Every product we design and every trip we plan comes straight from the heart. We want kids and adults alike to disconnect from screens and reconnect with the mud, the speed, and the outdoors.

video.title: Our Story in Motion
video.desc: Watch our journey unfold as we blend innovation with the thrill of adventure. From the drawing board to the dirt trails, see how {company} brings electric offroad biking to life.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.desc: We believe in the power of collaboration. Our best ideas come from brainstorming in nature and working closely with local guides and creators.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We combine years of experience with fresh ideas. Creating electric offroad bikes requires precise execution and forward-thinking design.

safety.title: Safety
safety.desc: Safety is paramount in every adventure. From the build quality of our bikes to the planning of experiences, we never compromise.

cta.title: Join the Adventure
cta.desc: Have questions about our bikes or want to collaborate?

form.title: Get in Touch
form.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Please fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

cookie.description: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site traffic.
